items.name: African Trading Co.
items.description: In the shop you will find gifts to suit even the biggest of kids. From treats to souvenirs as well as photos and other supplies.

items.name: Market Square Gift Shop
items.description: At the centre of the park you will discover the Chessington Shop with an exciting array of souvenirs, treats and gifts. For refreshments and supplies, the Chessington Shop is your port of call between each new adventure.

items.name: Kung Fu Panda
items.description: For a limited time only meet the star of DreamWorks Kung Fu Panda 3. Come along for a chance to meet and have a photo with Po.

items.name: Phone Charging
items.description: Found in several locations across the resort these stations offer a convenient way to charge your mobile device.

items.name: Photo Collections
items.description: We want you to have a wild time while you’re with us and to create great memories to take home. Capture the thrills and fun of your visit and receive digital photos to share with family and friends.

items.name: The Coffee Hut
items.description: Sip our delicious Rainforest Alliance coffee and why not treat yourself from a selection of scrumptious cakes, muffins and freshly handmade sandwiches.

items.name: Toadie's Crazy Cars
items.description: Climb into the driver’s seat and take the wheel of a vintage car for a whacky road trip around Toadie’s garden. It’s great fun for all the family.

items.name: Treetop Hoppers
items.full_name: Penguins of Madagascar Mission: Treetop Hoppers
items.description: Young Adventurers are invited to join the Penguins of Madagascar in their latest secret mission.

items.name: First Aid Centre
items.description: If you have a lost child, require first aid or assistance please contact a member of staff.

items.name: Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities can be found next to toilets at Lodge Gate. Facilities are also available in the Adventurers' Chicken Shack.

items.name: Baby Feeding Room
items.description: The baby feeding rooms can be found in Forbidden Kingdom and Market Square.

items.name: Disabled Toilets
items.description: Toilets with disabled access are available throughout the Resort and are accessible with a RADAR key.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Forbidden Hot Dogs
items.description: Grab a juicy hot dog or drink as you venture around the Forbidden Kingdom.

items.name: Fried Chicken Co.
items.description: Enjoy 100% chicken pieces or southern fried burgers and wraps, freshly hand breaded and prepared daily. Eat in or take away, the choice is yours.

items.name: Pharaoh's Bazaar
items.description: The treasures of the ancient Egyptian pharaohs are legendary. But our intrepid explorers have discovered great riches of their own and brought them back to Pharaoh's Bazaar for you to browse and buy.

items.name: Rameses Revenge
items.description: Prepare for a soaking on this thrilling ride that turns you upside down, spins you around and just when you thought Rameses had got his revenge, lowers you down head first over splashing water fountains.

items.name: Tomb Blaster
items.description: Adventurers are on a mission to battle the Curse of the Mummy. Ride through the Ancient Egyptian labyrinth armed with a laser gun to shoot mummies and scarab beetles and rid the tomb of its evil curse. What will you score?

items.name: Canopy Capers
items.description: This is a sky-high adventure for all the family, as you make your way along bouncing rope walkways, explore the fantasy tree house and see who’s first to make it to the other side.

items.name: Dragon's Fury
items.description: This is one very angry dragon and you’re in for a roller coaster ride through dizzying twists and turns, dips and dives and all the while your car is spinning and spinning.

items.name: Dragon's Playhouse
items.description: Pint-sized adventurers can have the time of their lives, climbing, bouncing and exploring in Chessington’s huge soft play centre.

items.name: Explorer
items.description: Entrance and exit for guests parked in grass and shingle car parks.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Griffin's Galleon
items.description: Join the fun-loving crew on board Griffin’s Galleon and ride the waves back and forth with an unexpected turn at each end.

items.name: Hydration Station
items.description: Looking to refill your quencher? Head to the Hydration Station!

items.name: Baby Changing
items.full_name: Land of the Dragons Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities are available across the Resort.

items.name: Lockers
items.description: Secure, lockers are available to purchase in Market Square, Transylvania and Land of the Dragons. For a small locker the prices are: £1 up to 1 hour or £5 for the whole day. For a large locker the prices are: £2 up to 1 hour or £10 for the whole day.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Original Sandwich Company
items.description: Tuck into handmade sandwiches prepared daily using only the freshest ingredients, add a cup of Rainforest Alliance coffee and that should fill a gap before your next adventure.

items.name: Sea Dragons
items.description: We’ve tamed these friendly Sea Dragons so that little adventurers can hop on board a boat and enjoy a gentle ride round and round on the high seas.

items.name: Wild Factor
items.description: An amazing opportunity to learn and get up-close with some of the worlds strangest creepy crawlies… including Giant Millipedes, Cockroaches and even a Giant Snail.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities are available across the Resort.

items.name: Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities are available across the Resort.

items.name: Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities are available across the Resort.

items.name: Carousel
items.description: Chessington’s Carousel is a genuine golden-oldie, a classic merry-go-round with colourful horses to ride up and down on and carriages to sit back and relax in. It’s a taste of good, old-fashioned family fun everyone will love.

items.name: Disabled Toilets
items.description: Toilets with disabled access are available throughout the Resort and are accessible with a RADAR key.

items.name: Disabled Toilets
items.description: Toilets with disabled access are available throughout the Resort and are accessible with a RADAR key.

items.name: Disabled Toilets
items.description: Toilets with disabled access are available throughout the Resort and are accessible with a RADAR key.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Guest Help and Information
items.description: Chessington's dedicated Guest Help and Information team are here to answer any questions you may have. They can assist with, parent swap passes, height checking, lost children wristbands and much more.

items.name: Hocus Pocus Hall
items.description: Expect the unexpected and ghostly goings-on as you make your way through this phantasmagorical 4-D experience, housed in Chessington’s haunted mansion. Watch out for the wizard and mischievous goblins – the crazy tenants of Hocus Pocus Hall.

items.name: ATM
items.description: For your convenience cash machines are available across the resort.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: ATM
items.description: For your convenience cash machines are available across the resort.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: ATM
items.description: For your convenience cash machines are available across the resort.

items.name: Baby Feeding Room
items.description: The baby feeding rooms can be found in Forbidden Kingdom and Market Square.

items.name: Disabled Toilets
items.description: Toilets with disabled access are available throughout the Resort and are accessible with a RADAR key.

items.name: Market Square Donuts
items.description: These donuts are the talk of the square! Fresh donuts made right before your eyes.

items.name: Market Square Hot Dogs
items.description: Escape the hustle and bustle of the Market Square and create your own hot dog with a selection of toppings to choose from.

items.name: Lockers
items.description: Secure, lockers are available to purchase in Market Square, Transylvania and Land of the Dragons. For a small locker the prices are: £1 up to 1 hour or £5 for the whole day. For a large locker the prices are: £2 up to 1 hour or £10 for the whole day.

items.name: Phone Charging
items.description: Found in several locations across the resort these stations offer a convenient way to charge your mobile device.

items.name: Market Square Pizza Pasta
items.description: Venture into Market Square Pizza Pasta and find range of pizzas, pastas and freshly prepared salads. Stay as long as you like whilst you enjoy an all you can eat family meal.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities are available across the Resort.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Smokehouse BBQ
items.description: Featuring low & slow roasted pulled pork, beef brisket, pork ribs and chicken, all cooked in a wood barbecue pit and smoked to perfection, it will be sure to have you coming back for more.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Sweet Shop
items.description: More sweets then you could ever imagine all under one roof! Create your own Pick & Mix selection from the huge variety at Chessington’s very own Sweet Shop. Choose from candy floss, ice cream, bubble gum, popcorn and many more sweets and treats!

items.name: Telephone
items.description: No call credit on your mobile? If you have cash our payphone in Market Square can help.

items.name: Tiny Truckers
items.description: We’ve scaled down our kings of the road so that even little adventurers can get behind the wheel in this colourful convoy of trucks.

items.name: The Hub
items.description: Get a year of great days out, and the freedom to return again and again with our great value Annual Passes.

items.name: Mexican Cantina
items.description: Join us in the Cantina for freshly rolled Burrito’s, choose from Spicy or mild chicken, tasty beef or vegetable served with nachips, guacamole, sour cream or salsa.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Rattlesnake
items.description: This is a right rattling rollercoaster ride and you’ll be in hiss-sterics as you snake your way through the sharp turns, inclines and sudden dips of the old Mexican tin mine. Life sure has its ups and downs for adventurers.

items.name: Scorpion Express
items.description: The Scorpion Express rollercoaster is a fun ride for all the family and brave young adventurers can experience their first rollercoaster thrill.

items.name: VIP
items.description: VIP experiences are designed to make even your wildest dreams come true. From Behind the Scenes Tours, Birthday Parties or Giraffe Feeding you can book your adventures here!

items.name: Dragon Falls
items.description: Climb aboard your boat for a adventurous cruise through the winding rivers, the dips and gentle rapids of the Mystic East. And just when you think the river has been tamed, hold on tight because you’re in for a surprise when you reach… the falls.

items.name: Mystic Donuts
items.description: In the heart of Mystic East, stumble across Mystic Donuts with fresh donuts made right before your eyes.

items.name: Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities are available across the Resort.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Mystic Ices
items.description: Discover a world of dessert inspiration, with Animal Waffles and delicious ice cream to choose from.

items.name: Oriental Express
items.description: Discover a world of dessert inspiration, with Animal Waffles and delicious ice cream to choose from.

items.name: Peeking Heights
items.description: Adventurers can take time out and take in panoramic views over the Park and, on a clear day, beyond to the skyline of London. Life’s great at the top, so hit the heights on board Chessington’s observation wheel.

items.name: Black Buccaneer
items.description: Ahoy me hearties, get down to Pirates Cove and bring your crew aboard the original pirate ship, the Black Buccaneer. It’s a stomach-churning adventure on the high seas, as you swing backwards and forwards, and higher and higher.

items.name: Captain's Fish & Chips
items.description: Try our freshly cooked MCS* accredited cod & chips - a hearty meal for any swashbuckler exploring Pirate's Cove.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Seastorm
items.description: Beware adventurers, there’s a gale warning in Pirates Cove. So get the family all aboard Seastorm and ride it out, twisting and turning over the ‘waves’ in your miniature pirate galleon.

items.name: Bubbleworks
items.description: You’ll laugh, you’ll smile, you’ll sing along on this frothy, foamy, family fun ride. Safe inside your ‘bubble tub’, you’ll float through chutes passing fantastical animated scenes, en route to a grand finale of fountains arching overhead.

items.name: Disabled Changing Places
items.description: We are proud to be the first Theme Park in England to offer a Changing Places toilet, which can be found in Transylvania. We aim to provide a hygienic, dignified place for people with profound disabilities and their carers to use.

items.name: Fangtasia Gift Shop
items.description: Once you’ve flown through Transylvania on the Vampire rollercoaster it’s time to look the part with lots of Vampire goodies.

items.name: ATM
items.description: For your convenience cash machines are available across the resort.

items.name: Baby Changing
items.description: Baby changing facilities are available across the Resort.

items.name: Disabled Toilets
items.description: Toilets with disabled access are available throughout the Resort and are accessible with a RADAR key.

items.name: Lockers
items.description: Secure, lockers are available to purchase in Market Square, Transylvania and Land of the Dragons. For a small locker the prices are: £1 up to 1 hour or £5 for the whole day. For a large locker the prices are: £2 up to 1 hour or £10 for the whole day.

items.name: Toilets
items.description: Toilets are available throughout the resort.

items.name: Vampire
items.description: Just like a bat out of hell, this family-friendly rollercoaster (height restriction only 1.1 metres) gets you soaring through the skies and flying over the treetops with your legs dangling below you.

items.name: Vampire Bites
items.description: Sink your teeth into delicious animal waffles and ice creams direct from the Vampire himself!

items.name: Vampire's Burger Kitchen
items.description: Visit Vampire’s Burger Kitchen and sink your teeth into our succulent burgers. We are all about delivering the best quality burger everytime you visit, this is why we only use 100% beef & chicken breast.

items.name: Asian Ices
items.description: What better way to cool down in a lost land than with a delicious ice cream and chilled drink?

items.name: Explorer Supplies
items.description: Be prepared for your Wild Adventure and grab some supplies or a souvenir of your visit at Explorer's Supplies.

items.name: Jungle Bus
items.description: Are you ready for a bus trip with a difference? Great, take your seat on the Jungle Bus and instead of just going along, you’ll swing up into the air for a top-deck view over Wild Asia.

items.name: KOBRA
items.description: Rising from the ruins of Wild Asia, the untamed KOBRA takes you on a thrilling ride, spinning through the air as you travel backwards and forwards on a 90 metre track at an awesome 43mph. Adventurers beware, this is a ride with some serious bite.

items.name: Lorikeet Lagoon
items.description: Go truly wild on an expedition through the Lorikeet Lagoon, part of Wild Asia... a beautiful way to meet these exotic and colourful birds.

items.name: Maharaja's Market
items.description: Within the shadow of the KOBRA, resourceful locals have created a haven of temptation for intrepid travellers to explore. Within sacred walls lies the Maharajas Market, a treasure trove of exotic gifts and provisions.

items.name: ATM
items.description: For your convenience cash machines are available across the resort.

items.name: Monkey Swinger
items.description: Whatever your age, bring out your inner cheeky little monkey on this fun ride that will have you swinging through the air, soaring round and round, getting higher and higher. Choose your seat carefully… you could get very wet.

items.name: Temple of Mayhem
items.description: Located in the ancient ruins of Wild Asia, the Temple of Mayhem is a two-storey house of adventure where you can explore, run wild and shoot your fellow adventurers as they make their own way through the temple.

items.name: Tuk Tuk Turmoil
items.description: Tuk tuks are the nippy little auto-rickshaws that cram the streets of Bangkok and this is Chessington’s version. You’re in control as you chase fellow adventurers around, but watch out for others coming at you from all sides.

items.name: Smoking Area
items.description: Smoking is only permitted in the designated smoking areas.

items.name: Alaotran Gentle Lemur
items.description: This Critically Endangered species is a native of Madagascar and is the only species of primate to live exclusively in wetlands around Lake Alaotra. They live in social groups with an average of three to five individuals and feed on papyrus leaves.

items.name: AMAZU Animal Talk
items.description: If you have cheeky monkeys, bring them along to learn about our monkeys.  After the talk our Keeper will be on hand to answer any questions.

items.name: AMAZU Shop
items.description: Chessington Zoo is home to more than 1,000 amazing animals and in this jungle hideaway you can meet and take home your own cuddly version. Or find a new furry friend and bring it to life by creating your own cuddly toy.

items.name: AMAZU Treetop Adventure
items.description: AMAZU Treetop Adventure where young adventurers can play amongst real life monkeys and other amazing animals as you follow the adventure trail through the heights of AMAZU!

items.name: Animal Antics Show
items.description: Exotic animals including Meerkats, Coati, Binturongs and Macaws will come up close and personal to audiences in the Wild Wood Animal Antics Show.

items.name: Binturong
items.description: A vulnerable species, Binturongs can be found in the forests of South-East Asia, where they move slowly through the treetops using their tail like an extra hand. Curiously they give off a scent that smells a bit like freshly made popcorn.

items.name: Bolivian Squirrel Monkey
items.description: Their specie is widespread and adaptable to habitat change. They can be found in Bolivia, Brazil and Peru.

items.name: Capybara
items.description: The Capybara, native to South America, is the largest rodent in the world, growing to over a metre in length.

items.name: Capybara Talk
items.description: Capybaras are proficient swimmers, swimming with only their nostrils, eyes, and ears above the surface. They are also known to swim underwater - sometimes for considerable distances.

items.name: Carnivore Talk and Feed
items.description: See the big cats feed. Please see signs in Trail of the Kings to find out which animal is being fed.

items.name: Carpathian Lynx
items.description: Once common throughout Europe, these shy and solitary cats are now extinct in many regions, but can still be found in the Carpathian Mountains in Eastern and Central Europe. They can live up to 17 years in the wild and longer in captivity.

items.name: Children's Zoo
items.description: The Children's Zoo is the perfect opportunity for animal lovers to interact with a range of farmyard friends, including pygmy goats, chickens, KuneKune pigs and sheep.

items.name: Children's Zoo Meet & Greet
items.description: Come along and see our gorgeous guinea pigs, sleepy sheep and kind Kunekunes’ who are always pleased to welcome new faces in to their homes.

items.name: Creepy Caves
items.description: Explore a world of reptiles, snakes and creepy crawlies, including pythons, tarantulas, and other fascinating lizards, frogs and caterpillars!

items.name: Donut Shack
items.description: Get your paws on fresh donuts made right before your eyes; a perfect treat on your day out!

items.name: Dorcas Gazelle
items.description: Native to the deserts of North Africa and the Middle East, these slender animals can survive without drinking, getting all the liquid they need from their diet of plants. They are incredibly fast and can run at almost 80kph.

items.name: Education Centre
items.description: Our individual blend of animals and theme park rides truly offers a plethora of learning opportunities - whether you are covering topics like conservation and classifications or even Marketing and Business Studies.

items.name: Fossa
items.description: Native to the Indian Ocean island of Madagascar, Fossas look like a long ‘stretched’ cat but are in fact a relative of the mongoose. Their long tails help them balance as they climb trees hunting their prey, such as small mammals and birds.

items.name: Gorilla Talk and Feed
items.description: Please check the times on the board at Trail of the Kings.

items.name: Gorillas
items.description: Very endangered in its forest habitat in Central Africa, gorillas are the largest apes and live in groups dominated by a silverback - a mature alpha male with silver-grey hair on its back.

items.name: Grevy’s Zebra
items.description: This endangered species, now found only in Kenya and Ethiopia, is the largest of all the zebras and like its cousins, the exact pattern of stripes is unique to each animal.

items.name: Hotel Gate
items.description: Entrance and exit for guests staying in our onsite Safari and Azteca hotels.

items.name: Kirk’s Dik-Dik
items.description: These shy animals are small antelopes weighing around 7 kg when fully grown. Originating in Eastern and South-Western Africa, they mate for life and get their name from the distinctive ‘dik-dik’ alarm call they make when they are threatened.

items.name: Lions
items.description: Smaller than its African cousin, the Asiatic Lion was almost hunted to extinction but now some 350 live in India’s Gir Forest National Park. Males are much bigger than females and have a distinctive big mane and a roar that can carry for five miles.

items.name: Lodge
items.description: Park entrance and exit for those arriving via public transport or parking in a tarmac car park.

items.name: Madagascar meet and greet
items.description: Come along and meet your favourite Madagascar character and get a great photo.

items.name: Meerkats
items.description: Nothing to do with a ‘cat’, this appealing animal is in fact a mongoose. They live in underground burrows in large groups and when out hunting several animals will stand on their hind legs looking out for predators and giving a warning signal.

items.name: Monkey Walkthrough
items.description: Come to our Monkey Walkthrough, where you can see a variety of different animals up close.

items.name: Ocean Talk and Feed
items.description: Watch and learn about the sea creatures in our magical SEA LIFE Centre.

items.name: Ocelot
items.description: Also known as the dwarf leopard each ocelot has a unique coat pattern. Ocelots are carnivores and can be found across South America.

items.name: Ostrich
items.description: The largest of all the birds (and laying the biggest eggs), the flightless ostrich relies on its running speed of up to 70kph to escape danger.

items.name: Otter Talk
items.description: At Chessington, we have a successful breeding family of otters, with parents Lancelot and Mina taking charge. If you fancy learning more about our loveable otter family, why not come along to our Otter Presentation.

items.name: Otters
items.description: Vulnerable in their natural habitat, these are the smallest species of otter in the world and are perfectly at home on land or in water. They live in extended family groups and younger family members help to raise their little brothers and sisters.

items.name: Pandamonium Live Show
items.description: Discover a brand new way to be entertained in 2016 with our exciting new show, Pandamonium! You will hardly believe your eyes as life-size and life-like animatronic pandas create chaos on stage and have the whole family roaring with laughter!

items.name: Pandamonium Meet and Greets
items.description: Meet our amazing life-size and life-like animatronic pandas! You won't believe your eyes as you get up close to these exotic endangered animals.

items.name: Penguin Bay
items.description: Chessington’s resident penguins have a brand new walk-through enclosure allowing you to come up close and personal with our Humboldt penguins. The area has transformed to feature a larger viewing area and covered seating.

items.name: Penguin Talk
items.description: Humboldt Penguins are a warm weather species that live off the coasts of Chile & Peru in South America. Come and join our Zoo Keepers for our fun, fact-filled talks.

items.name: Ray Talk and Feed
items.description: Watch one of nature's most graceful creatures feed in our SEA LIFE Centre.

items.name: Reef Fish Talk
items.description: Hear about this amazing eco-system.

items.name: Reindeer
items.description: Known as Caribou in America, reindeers live in the cold north, including the Arctic. They have thick coats to keep them warm, flat hooves that act as snow shoes and both males and females re-grow their amazing long antlers every year.

items.name: SEA LIFE Centre
items.description: Our SEA LIFE centre is packed full of fun exhibitions, including interactive rock pools, daily talks and feeding sessions as well as a breathtaking walkthrough ocean tunnel.

items.name: SEA LIFE Shop
items.description: Once you have explored Chessington’s amazing SEA LIFE centre be sure to visit the SEA LIFE shop for some more underwater fun.

items.name: Sealion Bay
items.description: Splash down to Sealion Bay for the chance to see Harley and Dante play in the water!

items.name: Sealion Show
items.description: At Sealion Bay we have 4 Californian Sealions splashing about in the water – 2 boys and 2 girls – who would love you to come over and see them.

items.name: SOKO Shop
items.description: If you're in our hotels pop over to the SOKO shop to pick up a souvenir of your time at Chessington.

items.name: Spider Monkey
items.description: Spider Monkey can be found in Ecuador. Their diet consists of 90% fruit and 10% nuts and seeds. They are very chatty and like to live in big groups of up to 35 monkeys but split up during the day to find food.

items.name: Sumatran Tigers
items.description: An endangered species with only around 300 left in the wild, this smallest of the tiger species is found in game reserves on the Indonesian island of Sumatra.

items.name: Temple Restaurant & Bar
items.description: A unique and interactive dining experience set in the heart of a mystical ancient temple, where a fountain that was once the life force of the jungle is protected by the wildlife that call it home.

items.name: Zafari Bar & Grill
items.description: Our African themed restaurant at the Chessington Safari Hotel. Choose from a range of international specialities fresh from the grill.

items.name: Flying Jumbos
items.description: They say an elephant never forgets. And you won’t forget this fun flight aboard your very own flying elephant. As you fly around, you control just how high you go, making this jumbo-sized fun for little adventurers.

items.name: Greater Flamingo
items.description: Flamingos live in colonies often with thousands of breeding pairs, yet mothers can identify their own chick by its call.

items.name: ZUFARI
items.description: ZUFARI – Ride into Africa! Is a theme park adventure and safari combined. Come face to face with wonderful African animals such as White Rhino, Giraffe and Grevy’s Zebra as you embark on a thrilling off-road truck journey…
